title: What was a plot twist that no one saw coming? - Quora

response.answer_text: I have to go with; The Usual Suspects - An unknown director, a relatively unknown screenwriter, a cast with little star power. Obviously that has all changed for those people but if you guessed that Kevin Spacey was Keyser Soze the first time you saw it you are way more observant than I am.Who shot Liberty Valance - “When the legend becomes fact, print the legend.”. One could argue that this line became a guiding principle that has helped usher in our current state of terrible journalism and entertainment as news. It wasn’t not invented for this script but it was codified by a successful movie.

In film, Psycho, Soylent Green, The Sixth Sense all have twists that delightfully horrified. In literature, Ned Stark’s execution in Game of Thrones threw a lot of people, and of course, the finale for the show surprised and angered many. I think the #1. in recent memory belongs to Star Wars Episode V, The Empire Strikes Back. Wish I knew more from books
